markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghast Stiletto](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1886)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 36 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _ghast stiletto_ is a _+1 [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ wrapped in the still-undead skin of a [ghast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=219). While you wield the dagger, you gain a +1 status bonus to all saves against [paralysis](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28).

<document level="2" id="action-1579" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include skin from a ghast.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ghast Stiletto
